metadata.title: The genetic map comparator: A user-friendly application to display and compare genetic maps
metadata.abstract: © The Author 2017. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved.Motivation: Marker-assisted selection strongly relies on genetic maps to accelerate breeding programs. High-density maps are now available for numerous species. Dedicated tools are required to compare several high-density maps on the basis of their key characteristics, while pinpointing their differences and similarities. Results: We developed the Genetic Map Comparator-a web-based application for easy comparison of different maps according to their key statistics and the relative positions of common markers.

description: A user-friendly application to display and compare genetic maps.
name: The Genetic Map Comparator
